CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Content Pane for SharePoint Pages and News.
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools, design ideas, etc. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is also used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Content Pane for SharePoint Pages and News.
OldVersion.description: The content pane surfaces relevant authoring tools that help authors quickly browse and add content to SharePoint pages. With this new feature, authors can easily drag and drop web parts, media, and section templates for creating rich and engaging pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Loop generates a workspace after your Teams meeting
CurrentVersion.description: A workspace is jumpstarted and actively updated as new materials are shared in Teams to enable ongoing collaboration within Loop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Advanced Analytics - Battery health
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to make asset management decisions that optimize hardware costs and improve the end-user experience/productivity while using their devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Advanced Analytics - Battery health
OldVersion.description:
Allows IT admins to make asset management decisions
that optimize hardware costs and improve the end-user experience/productivity
while using their devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hiding of inactive channels
CurrentVersion.description: Easily keep your channels list relevant. Teams will automatically detect inactive channels you havenâ€™t interacted with in a while, and automatically hide them for you. You have the option to review the list of channels and unhide some or all of them, opt out of automatic hiding from settings, or initiate this process on demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot deployment kits in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: Prepare for and launch Copilot in your organization using our new deployment kit in Viva Amplify. This is a set of pre-written and formatted publications that will educate users on how to use Copilot, all of the M365 endpoints, and develop their AI skills. This is a tested set of communications that the Microsoft team used internally to ensure the right messages are reaching your end users and preparing them for Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot deployment kits in Viva Amplify
OldVersion.description: ,Prepare for and launch Copilot in your organization using our new deployment kit in Viva Amplify. This is a set of pre-written and formatted publications that will educate users on how to use Copilot, all of the M365 endpoints, and develop their AI skills. This is a tested set of communications that the Microsoft team used internally to ensure the right messages are reaching your end users and preparing them for Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing speaker recognition for Teams Rooms on Windows. This feature provides live transcription with speaker identification, creating a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. With speaker recognition, Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items by attributing contributions to individual speakers. Participants can easily set up a voice profile using the Teams Desktop app. Users' individual voice signatures are stored securely in your organization's tenant in the Microsoft Cloud, ensuring accurate capture of every contribution in every meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution for all Teams Rooms
OldVersion.description: Introducing speaker recognition for Teams Rooms on Windows. This feature provides live transcription with speaker identification, creating a unique "voiceprint" for each participant. With speaker recognition, Copilot in Teams can deliver meeting summaries, insights, and action items by attributing contributions to individual speakers. Participants can easily set up a voice profile using the Teams Desktop app. Users' individual voice signatures are stored securely in your organization's tenant in the Microsoft Cloud, ensuring accurate capture of every contribution in every meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multiple insights and notifications on profile cards
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, users were only able to see one insight or notification on their own or on a colleague's profile card. Now they will be able to see multiple insights through a Show All button.  #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Multiple insights and notifications on profile cards
OldVersion.description: Previously, users were only able to see one insight or notification on their own or on a colleague's profile card. Now they will be able to see multiple insights through a Show All button.  #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Device Action - Remove apps and configuration
CurrentVersion.description: Intune will have the ability to temporarily remove apps and config from a single device, and then initiate a restore. This is intended to help solve customers' challenges external to Intune and quickly restore end user productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) â€“ Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
CurrentVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) â€“ Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
OldVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .CSV file, in order to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a meeting or event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new role added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Organization Management, Purview Administrators role groups
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape. Specific Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with a new role to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups: Compliance Administrator, Organization Management, and Purview Administrators role groups. This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups; it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage Purview resources within Purview administrative unit scopes in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the userâ€™s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
OldVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the userâ€™s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View attachments for Meetings in Teams Calendar
CurrentVersion.description: File attachments added to a meeting invite in Outlook desktop or web app are now visible for invitees in Teams calendar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View attachments for Meetings in Teams Calendar
OldVersion.description: File attachments added to a meeting invite in Outlook desktop or web app are now visible for invitees in Teams calendar.
